data.name: Warface — "Syndicate" equipment set
data.detailed_description:
About the "Syndicate" set [/]

One of the best equipment sets.
  • When using 2 different items from the "Syndicate" gear, will activate a bonus, which will increase the weapon reloading speed by 10%.
  • When using 3 different items from the "Syndicate" gear, will activate a bonus, which will allow you to detect enemy claymores.
  • When using 4 different items from the "Syndicate" gear, will activate a bonus, which will increase protection from explosions by 30%, lowers incoming damage by 10 points per hit, and increase the sprint distance by 40%.
  • The 4 item bonus sums up with the bonuses for 2 and 3 set items.

The set includes 4 helmets and 4 vests for every class, boots, and gloves.

Syndicate Rifleman Helmet

The Syndicate helmets for every class increase the protection of the head by 40% and reduce the effect of flash grenades by 40%.

Syndicate Medic Helmet

The Syndicate helmets for every class increase the protection of the head by 40% and reduce the effect of flash grenades by 40%.

Syndicate Engineer Helmet

The Syndicate helmets for every class increase the protection of the head by 40% and reduce the effect of flash grenades by 40%.

Syndicate Sniper Helmet

The Syndicate helmets for every class increase the protection of the head by 40% and reduce the effect of flash grenades by 40%.

Syndicate Rifleman Vest

The vest gives you 160 armor points and increases the weapon changing speed by 10%.

Syndicate Medic Vest

The vest gives you 150 armor points and increases the weapon changing speed by 25%.

Syndicate Engineer Vest

The vest gives you 155 armor points and increases the weapon changing speed by 10%.

Syndicate Sniper Vest

The vest gives you 130 armor points and increases the weapon changing speed by 10%.

Syndicate Gloves

The gloves increase accuracy by 10%. And increase hand protection by 20%.

Syndicate Boots

The gloves sprint speed by 10%. And increase leg protection by 20%.

After payment, the items will appear on your in-game account. Wait 15 minutes or restart the game if necessary.

data.short_description: This is one of the most sought-after equipment sets in the game!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 415e
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 250 GTS / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 3470 / AMD Athlon 240GE
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
